name: Formatting BIG Numbers! Demo and Project File
name_original: Formatting BIG Numbers! Demo and Project File
description:
Hello Everyone!

This is a demo that is downloadable that goes along with a YouTube tutorial on how to format big numbers (up to 10^308) in games.   Using Order Of Magnitude (OOM), I show how the name, abbreviation, or scientific notation can be used to display a nicely formatted number to the player.

Use spacebar to attack in demo and the drop down to show different formatting options.

I have included the project file with the art removed for you to download as a reference in your own projects.  Feel free to use however, no credit needed, cc0 etc. 

Check it out on YouTube and let me know what you think!  Subscribe if you enjoyed, would make my day :

Cheers!

FoozleCC
